name: Exploding Bears
description:
Hello,

Welcome to Exploding Bears! It’s a game where you, a small fox, must go on a quest to defeat the bears that threaten your home! But destroying all the bears takes you down a further rabbit hole into a wasteland of a city you never thought possible. 

Use A to run left and D to run right.

Press space to jump, press twice to double jump! There is no limit to jumping against walls for extra height or speed, maybe you might find a few different places to explore. 

Press F to shoot a fireball attack. 

Be careful, you only have one life so don’t touch the bears or.. Er any deadly things for that matter. 

You can collect gems and see how many you can earn in each level! 

Thank you for playing!

Assets used: 

Ansimuz Sunny Land

AnsimuzWarped City Assets Pack

Grande PixelMine Tileset

Iphigenia Pixels2D Platfrom Tile Set - Cave

AnsimuzGothicVania Church Pack

Main menu, Game over backgrounds and assets- hand drawn by me
